title: Ek Latin and Ek Devanagari are Available
content:
Finally the Ek Latin and Ek Devanagari are available on [www.ektype.in](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414160941/http:/www.ektype.in/ "www.ektype.in")

The e-commerce part of the website is will under development. /Users/Admin/Desktop/Ek Type Flyer.png

Appreciate your feedback.
